snippet: The government has long denounced articles by Western news organizations as biased and dishonest, but Beijing has now adopted a very Western term to describe them....

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

lead_paragraph: The government has long denounced articles by Western news organizations as biased and dishonest, but Beijing has now adopted a very Western term to describe them.
